body:
Hi Jia,


You can use the -c option in rcontrib to average the coefficients of the
10,000 rays.


The command would look something like this:
rsensor -rd 10000 (MoreArguments) . | rcontrib -c 10000 (MoreArguments)
model.oct > sensor.vmx


Andy
